pages.text: Salt can be found in ore veins and can be used for many things, such as $(l:hexalia:tools/purifying_salts)Purifying Salts$().$(br2)You can place it on the ground by right-clicking, this is used for rituals.
You can combine Salt with Rotten Flesh to obtain Leather.
Salt can be combined in a crafting grid in order to obtain a Salt Block allowing you to store this resource more efficiently.
A lamp can be crafted with Copper Ingot and Torch to illuminate dark areas.
